jd: Hello,Hope you are doing well !Please let me know if you are interested Role: PostgreSQL Database DeveloperLocations: Phoenix, AZ (Day 1 Onsite)Duration: Long - Term ContractJob Description:We are hiring a skilled PostgreSQL Database Developer with expertise in database optimization, design, and development and experience working with federated database models.
